column2: You have ONE chance to beat Fugoro. If you lose, you can't retry.
I "borrowed" this urn from the first Gabrian Emperor's tomb.
Some say this living statue was once Orosei's sister.
High Priest Sario had endless fun with his victims. Literally endless.
This won the annual, "Build a Better Groundshaker" contest!
I had to sneak into Garudan's mountain for this beauty.
